meanings.definition: Make or become higher or more intense.
meanings.sent1: Adding more spices heightens the flavor of the soup.
meanings.sent2: Turning up the volume heightens the excitement of the movie.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to juggle while riding a unicycle only heightens the entertainment.
meanings.sent4: The rising tension heightens the suspense in the story.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the sunset heighten the beauty of the landscape.

meanings.definition: Increase the intensity or amount of.
meanings.sent1: Exercising regularly heightens your energy levels.
meanings.sent2: Studying hard heightens your chances of success.
meanings.sent3: Her love for ice cream only heightens her determination to finish the whole tub.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds heighten the sense of urgency to find shelter.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread heightens the anticipation of a delicious meal.
